q: a row of Egyptian military and national flags and read the council statement, proclaiming respect for the rule of law- perhaps a sign that the military aims to avoid imposing martial law. The military is IN_QUOT looking forward to a peaceful transition, for a free democratic system, to permit an elected civil authority to be in charge of the country, to build a democratic free nation, END_QUOT he said. The military underlined Muhammed Ali 's`` commitment to all its international treaties,'' reassurance that it continues to honor the 1979 peace treaty. The military underlined Muhammed Ali 's`` commitment to all its international treaties,'' reassurance that it continues to honor the 1979 peace treaty. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu welcomed the military's statement, saying the treaty IN_QUOT has greatly contributed to both countries and is the cornerstone for peace and stability in the entire Middle East. END_QUOT Israel has been deeply concerned that Muhammed Ali 's turmoil could threaten the peace accord. Muhammed Ali 's military strongly supports the peace deal, not in small part because it guarantees U.S. aid for the armed forces,

A day after being hospitalised following reports of a 36-hour drug and drink-fueled party at his home, Charlie Sheen , 45,`` voluntarily entered an undisclosed rehabilitation center'', his spokesperson Stan Rosenfield said. IN_QUOT He is most grateful to all who have expressed their concern, END_QUOT Rosenfield said, adding that Charlie Sheen had asked for privacy and that no additional information will be provided. It is the actor's third stint in rehab in 12 months. Broadcaster CBS, and Warner
